---
title: "Data consistency report"
author: ""
date: '`r format(Sys.Date(), "%B %d, %Y")`'
output:
  html_document:
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 2
    toc_float: true
    theme: !expr MATCHA::matcha_theme()
  pdf_document:
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 2
params:
    plots: NULL         
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```


```{r}
plots <- params$plots
# Reorder params$plots list so that summary is first if present
summary_idx <- which(names(plots) == "summary")
if (length(summary_idx) > 0L) {
  plots <- c(
    plots[summary_idx],
    plots[-summary_idx]
  )
}
```


```{r, results='asis'}
res <- purrr::imap(
  plots,
  function(x = .x, tbl_name = .y) {
    knitr::knit_child(
      system.file("report-table-child.Rmd", package = "MATCHA"),
      envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE
    )
  }
)
cat(unlist(res), sep = "\n")
```
